WRITING.TITLE: Unpopular opinion
WRITING.TEXT: From the still of adore you,to my ears it sounded more pop than usual concerning Harry's music so far I also expected it do be darker but that's another thing Excited nevertheless

So far,I believe lights up is Harry in his most versatile. Watermelon sugar is highly enjoyable but musically he doesn't take any risk like he did with lights up which was so creative. I expect adore you to be on the same vein as watermelon sugar.I sense his creativity will peak on she and on fine line
The naked photo,I believe it channels prince's lovesexy album cover

Still this is way too pop for Harry.and he said he held back on his debut album. But then we had s.o.t.t. as his first single, kiwi (rock),two ghosts (a guitar ballad) and all the songs that had to do with an old age style. Maybe he proves me wrong when he releases adore you
But he cites all his influences and they are rock musicians It doesn't make sense being pop considering the music he prefers
Again,even rolling stone magazine promoted him this way in September.Harry screams rock music.His tastes even in fashion scream Prince,bowie and the rest flamboyant performers
Hope he uses real instruments again
Nothing can dethrone lights up as of now
He said that but what can someone say?I was a bit disappointed by adore you.the pop track I was expecting he would release. Lights up is still on top for me
I have one but I believe it's too precious to sell it
The rest of the album will surprise us I want to believe
